item.title: OpenAI appears poised to launch ChatGPT Pro subscription plans at $200 USD per month
item.description: Screenshots posted on X by third-party AI engineer Tibor Blaho show the new tier, ChatGPT Pro, priced at $200 U.S. dollars per month.

item.title: Light Field Lab launches SolidLight holographic imagery systems
item.description: Light Field Lab has launched its SolidLight Holographic and Volumetric display technologies that will power some amazing imagery of the future.

item.title: How Microsoft defends against 7000 password attackers per second
item.description: Vasu Jakkal's reflects how AI is the core DNA of Microsoft security, permeating every product and service the software giant produces.
